record.title: THE CALENDAR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed en bloc to the consideration of Calendar No. 105, S. 521, Calendar No. 106, S. 801, and H.R. 753, which is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the bills be read three times, passed, the motions to reconsider be laid on the table en bloc, the consideration of these items appear separately in the Record, and any statements be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
